comments:
Description:
Exception is thrown out when select two data and click "Hyperlink" tab in Property Editor.

Build number: 
2.2.1.v200708024-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1. New a report with two data.
2. Select two data and click "Hyperlink" tab in Property Editor

Expected result:
No exception.

Actual result:
Exception is thrown out.
